# Summary
Converts [SQLAlchemy](https://www.sqlalchemy.org/) models to [AtlasGo](https://atlasgo.io/) HCL.

# Quickstart
<!-- Installation -->
- Run `pip install sqlalchemy2atlas`
<!-- Usage -->
- Run `sqlalchemy2atlas -h`


## Driver Support
- [x] PostgreSQL
    - [x] 14.x
- [ ] Cloud Spanner
- [ ] MySQL
- [ ] SQLLite
